channel.title: Python on AWS. DevOps. Python.
channel.description: Recent content in Python on AWS. DevOps. Python.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Platform - CCTP
item.description: Project Requirements Design an Intelligent NLP-based high-frequency trading desktop application utilizing Binance API Project Details Fully object-oriented platform with up to 10,000 microtransactions/minute via Binance API Custom algorithm with a 59% profit ratio, utilizing sentiment analysis and technical analysis Sentiment analysis via NLP/N-grams, Technical analysis via SMA/EMA/Bollinger bands Coded in Python, Machine learning model trained via GCP Deployed to windows hosts via docker Skills: Python, GCP, Binance API, NLP, Docker

item.title: Forrest Brazeal's Cloud Resume Challenge - This website!
item.description: Project Requirements Design an AWS-based full-stack serverless website - This website! Project Details HTML, CSS, JavaScript frontend hosted on S3 AWS Serverless Application Model (SAM) (Cloudformation) for Infrastructure as Code DynamoDB, Lambda, and API Gateway for real-time visitor counter Route 53, ACM, and Cloudfront (CDN) for HTTPS/SSL GitHub Actions for CI/CD using the AWS/SAM CLI Skills: AWS, Python, HTML, CSS, JS, SAM, GitHub Actions

item.title: Logistics Optimization System
item.description: Project Requirements Logistics system based on graphs to suggest the most optimal path Project Details Architected logistics movement plan based on graph network Intelligent routing for up to 5000 vehicles tested Various land barriers factored in (weighted graphs) Coded in Python with the help of networkx, osmnx, and pandas Output dynamic routes based on a multitude of factors Skills: Python, Pandas, Leaflet JS, OpenStreetMap
